statements: UPDATE blockchain_transactions SET amount = 100.50 WHERE transaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE blockchain_transactions SET amount = 200.50, timestamp = '2022-01-15 10:30:00' WHERE transaction_id = 'a60cf5ab-4126-4de5-9502-0c4a9340b3a0';

UPDATE user_accounts SET account_balance = 5000.00, created_at = '2022-02-28 10:30:00' WHERE user_id = 2002;
UPDATE blockchain_transactions SET block_number = 1000, amount = 5000.00 WHERE transaction_id = 12345;
UPDATE user_accounts SET account_name = 'New Account Name' WHERE user_id = 54321;
UPDATE blockchain_transactions SET amount = 150 WHERE transaction_id = 1001;
UPDATE blockchain_blocks SET miner_address = '0xAbCdEf123' WHERE block_number = 50;
UPDATE blockchain_transactions SET amount = 1500.00, sender_address = '0x1234abcd' WHERE transaction_id = 1001;
UPDATE blockchain_addresses SET owner_name = 'Alice Smith', created_timestamp = '2022-01-15 10:30:00' WHERE address_id = 200;
UPDATE blockchain_transactions SET transaction_amount = 5000.00 WHERE transaction_id = 'c902bcb7-c2ad-4a55-9d46-3a6b6e703b47';
UPDATE blockchain_addresses SET balance = balance + 1000.00 WHERE address_id = 'f05e2092-8456-45d9-a6b0-0e71cbcc88d4';
UPDATE blockchain_transactions SET sender_address = 'new_sender_address', recipient_address = 'new_recipient_address' WHERE transaction_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';
UPDATE blockchain_blocks SET transaction_count = 5, miner_address = 'new_miner_address' WHERE block_id = 100;
